item.title: A review of Pythagorean triples from both classical and modern viewpoints
item.description: arXiv:2403.17966v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this note we present a survey on some classical and modern approaches on Pythagorean triples. Some questions are also posed in direction of some materials under review. In particular some non commutative and operator theoretical approaches of Pythagorean triples are discussed
item.dc:creator: Ali Taghavi
